description:
A Gunpla builder who became famous when Gundam plastic models were first released. His works were praised as being made by the hand of God, and he was singled out as a Meijin. The Meijin`s title was handed down through the generations, and Yuuki Tatsuya is now the third to inherit the Kawaguchi name.
Source: Official Website
name: Meijin Kawaguchi
